mapper.select: select nvl2((select mem_id from members where mem_tel=#{mem_tel}),0,1) from dual
select nvl2((select mem_id from members where mem_id=#{mem_id}),0,1) from dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(mem_id, mem_tel, mem_name, mem_addr, mem_email, mem_pw, mem_birth,mem_gender,mem_hobby,mem_job) VALUES (#{mem_id},#{mem_tel},#{mem_name},#{mem_addr},#{mem_email},#{mem_pw},#{mem_birth},#{mem_gender},#{mem_hobby},#{mem_job})
mapper.select: select * from members where mem_id = #{mem_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mem_pw = #{mem_pw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
